    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ob 1. maju - prazniku dela - IGRA</string>
            <string language="en">International workers\' day - Play</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internationale Arbeiter \ ' Tag - Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ouvriers internationaux \ 'jour - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Trabalhadores internacionais \ ' dia - jogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Operai internazionali \ 'giorno - gioco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διεθνές ημέρα εργαζομένων \ "- παιχνίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Trabajadores internacionales \ ' día - juego</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Za proslavo ob 1. maju sem pripravila igro, skozi katero naj bi učenci-gledalci osvojili pomen praznika dela in spoznali delo in življenje Prežihovega Voranca.</string>
            <string language="en">Play that can be used before the first of may - International workers\' day. Rising awareness about workers\' day and life and work of Slovenian writer Prežihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dramatizacija</string>
            <string language="en">dramatization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prežihov voranc</string>
            <string language="en">prežihov voranc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">praznik dela</string>
            <string language="en">workers\' day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen Sie, das verwendete, bevor das erste von 
- kann internationale Arbeiter \ ' sein kann Tag. Steigendes 
Bewußtsein über Arbeiter \ ' Tag und Leben und Arbeit des slowenisch
Verfassers Pre?ihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jouez qui peut être avant que le premier de 
puisse - les ouvriers internationaux utilisés \ 'jour. 
Conscience se levante au sujet des ouvriers \ 'jour et vie et 
travail d'auteur slovène Pre?ihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogue que pode ser antes que o primeiro de possa 
- trabalhadores internacionais usados \ ' dia. Consciência 
levantando-se sobre trabalhadores \ ' dia e vida e trabalho do 
escritor esloveno Pre?ihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioc che può essere prima che il primo di possa 
- operai internazionali usati \ 'giorno. Consapevolezza 
aumentante circa gli operai \ 'giorno e vita e lavoro del produttore 
sloveno Pre?ihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το παιχνίδι που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί πριν από τον 
πρώτο μπορεί - διεθνές ημέρα εργαζομένων \ ". 
Αυξανόμενη συνειδητοποίηση για ημέρα εργαζομένων \ "και 
ζωή και εργασία του σλοβένικου συγγραφέα Pre?ihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegue que puede ser antes de que pueda el primer 
de - trabajadores internacionales usados \ ' día. Conocimiento 
de levantamiento sobre los trabajadores \ ' día y vida y trabajo del 
programa de escritura esloveno Pre?ihov Voranc.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dramatization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">pre?ihov voranc</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeiter \ ' Tag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
